title: Peek Hong
overview: Linin is a frivolous girl who is not averse to flirting with guys, but has never really loved. One of the suitors falls so in love with the heroine that he leaves his bride, and she takes her own life with grief, after which her mother suffers a stroke and is permanently bedridden. Tinapat, the brother of the dead girl, is completely broken after the death of his sister and the illness of his mother, and he decides to take revenge on Linin, whom he blames for all the troubles of the family. Here is only Linin first time in life truly falls in love with his avenger...
